description:
UWP 3D CAD Tool

Inspiration can strike anytime, anywhere—you could be at your desk, on site, on the go. And this shouldn’t be a limitation for CAD design. Transform your 3D modeling workflow with Shapr3D, an industrial-strength CAD tool for Windows. Go from idea to 3D prototyping in minutes, create anywhere, and export manufacturable models. Switch up your workflow with what works best for you: Start designing on your tablet, and add finishing touches on your PC or laptop.
